mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_score(n, k, arr):
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    (i, j) = (0, k)
    ans = 1
    while k > 0:
        ans += arr[j] // arr[i]
        k -= 1
        i += 1
        j += 1
    for indx in range(j, n):
        ans += arr[indx]
    return ans

def calculate_minimum_score(n, k, arr):
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    (i, j) = (0, k)
    ans = -1
    while k > 0:
        ans += arr[j] // arr[i]
        k -= 1
        i += 1
        j += 1
    for indx in range(j, n):
        ans += arr[indx]
    return ans
